imdb.plot outline: A FOX Sports Originals one-hour documentary special, BEING: THE FINEST follows the New York City Police Department's football team through their unimaginable 2013 season, culminating in their storied finale against The Bravest, the New York City Fire Department's squad. BEING: The Finest examines how the NYPD football team's love of the game is measured through the players' demanding work and home lives and also pays tribute to Officer Joe Pritchard, a member of the team who was killed shortly before the 2013 season began. From FOX sports 1.
imdb.title: Being the Finest
